reviewText: This movie was about the love and faith of two friends. It wasn't about who was right or who was wrong. I loved every person in this movie. It showed that children are so filled with love and hope. It showed that even a dad who didn't understand his son's could come to at least try to understand them. And it showed a Priest and a Rabbi with the ability to give unconditional love. Tearjerker, but worth every one of them.

Bought this for my grandchildren after seeing it myself on a rental.  I thought it was so special the way it depicted the differences in religions, and how the boys bonded and accepted each other, while the Catholic father was much less understanding.  I haven't not heard what the grandchildren thought of it.  ( They are in Hawaii now.)

Stolen Summer is heartwarming. I am smiling as I write this. Two beautiful boys, whose wisdom transcends grown-up words is exemplified in their pure thought, life's questions and play. The authenticity of the mid-70's Catholic and Jewish families lives .... one large and loud, the other small and introspective,although stereotypes, (and who cares when the movie and messages are this good) hit home with me.. I could relate.

I was really impressed with the movie Stolen Summer, so when I heard there was a documentary about it's making I check it out.  Mistake.  It almost seemed one of their objectives was to see how much trash talk they could use within each segment.  I'm sorry I didn't just leave the experience to the movie alone.
I had seen this movie previously, and it is a wonderful, feel good movie.  The case and the movie came in great condition.

Stolen Summer is one of the best films I have seen in a long time.  It was such a delight to watch.
The boys were wonderful actors as was the whole cast. It will make you laugh & cry and touch your heartstrings. You MUST see this film as it is a wholesome movie for the whole family to watch.
Great movie.  Had it on vhs. Missed seeing it. Everyone needsbto warch it.
I have seen this many times and somewhere lost my copy, so I bought another one.  Will show to a church discussion group regarding welcoming the stranger.
Don't remember what the product is......
This is a great summer family movie. Definitely makes you think, while at the same time delivering a solid feel good story.
This movie is so sweet! I know that it has some sad parts but it is still a very tender and redeeming movie. Makes you have hope for our society when most movies just tear it down.
Stolen Summer was great;  I bought it at Amazon's recommendation along with another video.  I like that! Price was good as well.
Wonderful movie that highlights how values shape our behaviors and decisions.  Refreshing change from the empty plotted movies we see most often today!

I recommend this movie highly  I was surprised that the movie was produced
by Miramax and directed by two fairly young liberals from the Boston area.

Great story, great moral, it shows that faith and understanding can move mountains.
This was a touching and funny story, it's a story that young and old can enjoy, no violence, no bad language, a treat from what's out there today.
Saw this on tv & fell in love with the movie. It was definitely underrated by Hollywood. Highly recommend it.
Very good movie

It is just a very nice family movie to watch, at the same time reminds us of the prejudicial culture we had in the past
which has not gone away yet!
Great movie with very good ideals.
nice
enjoyed seeing the outcome from project greenlight
I love this movie ... don't miss it.

Such a good wholesome movie about an Irish Catholic Family and a Jewish Family and their 2 small sons who become friends.  I have watched it years ago and decided to order it so I can watch it whenever I want to.
This is a very cute and touching movie.  I only buy movies that I know I already like so there were no surprises.  I'm happy to own a copy.
An excellent movie - something in it for everyone
Wonderful warm movie
